wikipedia_page.main: Daniel McMillan (born 12 August 1982) is a British handball player. He was born in Broxburn in West Lothian, Scotland. He competed for the British national team at the 2012 Summer Olympics in London.

response: At senior club level, Williams played in Germany for TUSEM Essen alongside future Team GB teammates Christopher McDermott, Daniel McMillan and Christopher Mohr before playing in Denmark with Halden Topphandball. Whilst there, he had to clean toilets to earn money after funding was cut. He later returned to England and played for Salford Handball Club before being selected for Great Britain in the 2012 Olympics. He captained the Olympic Squad and later played for Sandnes in Norway whilst studying for a business and administration degree.
